name: Watch your Mouse!
description:
This game was made for Trijam #171: The 3 hour game jam

The theme is: Watch your step.

In this game you need to watch your mouse is not in the clutches of the kitties!

Can you score 50?

------------------------
Controls:

Mouse - moving and dodjing kitties
R - restart
Escape - exit the game

------------------------

Graphics, music, sounds and code made by PhysicalFace.

Enjoy the game!
